new_skill_specs.name: analyze_ecosystem_dependencies
new_skill_specs.purpose: Analyze the relationships between organisms in an ecosystem to determine which organism is most dependent on a specific resource.
edge_cases: No direct dependency on the resource

tests.input: {"organisms": ["Tilapia", "Common water flea", "Great diving beetle", "Tadpole"], "relationships": {"Algae": ["Common water flea", "Tadpole"]}}
